turns.content:
Given this rough topic/question, formulate a clear, specific
research question suitable for external validation via Perplexity:

TOPIC: Validate hypothesis: The 16 SCALE levels in Standard Model of Code (Bit, Byte, Token, Statement, Block, Function, Class, File, Module, Workspace, Project, Organization, Platform, Ecosystem, Universe) represent an INTERNAL/EXTERNAL axis rather than a vertical hierarchy. INTERNAL scales (Bit→Function) are code-proximal and self-contained. EXTERNAL scales (Project→Universe) are world-distal and context-dependent. The boundary at Project/Workspace is where code meets world. This parallels RG flow in physics (UV→IR) and information theory (H(X) internal, H(Y|X) external).

Provide ONLY the research question, no explanation.
